title: Netorare Manga No Kuzu Otoko Ni Tensei Shita Hazu Ga Heroine Ga Yottekuru Ken
alternative_title: 寝取られ漫画のクズ男に転生したはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件 ; I Was Reincarnated As The Scumbag From a Netorare Manga, But The Heroine is Coming On To Me ; The Story of a Man Who Is Reincarnated as the Shi*tiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him
status: 寝取られ漫画のクズ男に転生したはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件 ; I Was Reincarnated As The Scumbag From a Netorare Manga, But The Heroine is Coming On To Me ; The Story of a Man Who Is Reincarnated as the Shi*tiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him
description:
Description :
        I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?
